column1: #text=The library is a magical place where dreams are made real and fantasies are explored .
#text=As I walk through the aisles and aisles of books I ca n't imagine what to choose .
#text=There are so many that my mind ca n't keep up .
#text=I love to read and I do it daily .
#text=It is my favorite hobby and I spend a majority of my time either at home reading or at the library finding new books to read .
#text=The best part about the library is not having to buy the books or spend money .
#text=You simple give them your card and they let you take the book home for a long enough period to read and bring back .
#text=If the book is too long to read then you can simply check it out again and bring it back when you are finished .
#text=As long I keep a good standing with the library I can keep doing this all my life !
